alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 12:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coconino County through 1245 PM MST... At 1221 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Angell to near Winona. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Twin Arrows, Angell and Winona. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 211 and 224. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
